**Example 1: 示例**

销毁集群

Input: 

```
tccli cdwch DestroyInstance --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --InstanceId cdwch-auqej7a
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "FlowID": "1231",
        "InstanceID": "cdwch-auqej7a",
        "ErrorMsg": "",
        "RequestId": "xasdfkqe2-a12q29-axdfas"
    }
}
```
